forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
